text: ahō ! viśvāsa kaḷavuni, num̆balā atara ekan̆gatāvayakin yutu vyāpārayakin (læbena dǣ anubhava kirīma) hæra num̆balāgē vastuva num̆balā væradi lesa anubhava nokaranu. tavada num̆balā (gæṭalu æti kara ganimin) num̆balāvama ghātanaya nokaranu. niyata vaśayenma allāh num̆balā kerehi asamasama karuṇānvitaya
